text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One afternoon, as I'm heading out of<n>the school building, I
come upon a<n>somber-looking Fuji Kiseki gazing out<n>the
window.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hehe, what sweet kids, practicing so<n>hard.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Just the grounds. The little ones are<n>staying after school for
extra training.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Each one of them is speeding off with<n>big, bright eyes, their
paths aimed<n>straight toward their dreams.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Their dreams as racers...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I want to run to make others happy,<n>but I don't know...
Something inside<n>me is saying that alone is not quite<n>
enough.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I fear it will take more than that to<n>become Fuji Kiseki, the
greatest<n>entertainer.
choice_data_list: Is there anything I can do to help?
Is there anything I can do to help?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Good gracious! My feelings just<n>come right out when I'm
around you,<n>don't they? Actually, let me take you<n>up on
that—there's somewhere I want<n>to go.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Shall we make it a date, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm happy to accompany Fuji Kiseki<n>for the night. Our
destination is...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
This is our destination for tonight.<n>Behold, the Okan Classic
Hotel.
choice_data_list:
Wait, this is, like, one of the fanciest hotels in
Japan!

Wait, this is, like, one of the fanciest hotels in
Japan!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Perfect for a date, wouldn't<n>you say?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ...I joke. You see, this hotel holds<n>within it a theater!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
And today there's an important play.<n>My dear friend—no, my
former rival—is<n>about to make her stage debut.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
We've been friends since our<n>children's theater days. It
would<n>always be me and her competing for<n>the lead role.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
When she chuckled, the audience<n>laughed. When she cried,
the audience<n>sobbed. She's truly an outstanding<n>talent.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
However, that's not the only thing<n>that made her
fearsome...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
She did, very much so. All that<n>remarkable ability, and she
was never<n>satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But I don't believe I've ever lost in<n>my desire to bring
happiness to<n>others. Still, there was a decided<n>difference
between us.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
And on tonight's stage, I mean to<n>ascertain exactly what
that was.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, the curtains rise.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The young woman's performance is<n>a sight to behold. She
shines bright,<n>never ceasing to captivate the<n>audience.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her every gaze and gesture radiates<n>tremendous passion.
She is without a<n>doubt the star of the show.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"Eclipse, incomparable goddess, I beg<n>you smile upon me.
Now, with my<n>dream in pieces, I need the strength<n>to stand
again."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"Should my one wish to win this fight<n>be granted, I would
pledge my undying<n>soul to you. Place the everlasting<n>
crown upon my head!"

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: A great play indeed.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Her spellbinding performance left me<n>in awe. Whether
whispered or<n>shouted forth, I felt each word plunge<n>right
into me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
In the moment, I didn't realize what<n>was making my body
tremble so hard.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But now I know. It's passion—a<n>passion for acting—that
drives one to<n>become their ideal self.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
It's also the enthusiasm to be the<n>best. The unbreakable
feeling,<n>bordering on obsession, to follow<n>one's dreams.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That's the kind of star performer who<n>held me transfixed.
choice_data_list: Have you found what you've been looking for?
Have you found what you've been looking for?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I saw what lies beyond...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The dream that lies beyond making<n>others happy.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That was a tour de force I'll never<n>forget. Congratulations
on your debut<n>as a lead performer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji's Childhood Friend
text_block_list.text:
Fuji! You came to watch me?! This is<n>great—I wanted you,
more than<n>anyone, to be here.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I was so amazed, that I'm stillspinning. It pains me to say it, buttonight, you were the greatestentertainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That doesn't mean I admit defeat,<n>though. One day I'm
going to surpass<n>you and give everyone an enchanting<n>
show they'll never forget!

text_block_list.name: Fuji's Childhood Friend
text_block_list.text:
And I'm going to climb to the top of<n>the theater world. We
may be on<n>different stages, but you're my rival,<n>now and
forever.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'm honored. Then let us both pursue<n>our dreams to their
ends.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji shakes hands with her friend,<n>who listens gleefully to
those kind<n>words before departing with a wave.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
It's peculiar. My body feels hot,<n>down to the core. I can't
help wanting<n>to run right this instant.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You know, Trainer, I'm really glad we<n>got to see this play
together.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I was actually scared at first—of<n>having to stare right into the
very thing<n>I still lack.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But with you there by my side, I was<n>able to see what's
past the point of<n>simply becoming the ideal me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I don't feel uncertain anymore,<n>thanks to you. I'll never
forget this<n>day.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Say, what's wrong? You got so quiet.
choice_data_list:
Nothing, I was just thinking how you look cooler
than ever.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Oh? What's this? Have you<n>perchance become smitten with
me?<n>Well, not that I would mind, of course!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
...Just joking! Let's get out of here<n>before I get in trouble
for breaking<n>curfew!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking at the time, I begin to panic,<n>and we start sprinting
toward the train<n>station.
